status.description: Status represents the current status of the PlacementDecision

decisions.description:
decisions is a slice of decisions according to a placement
The number of decisions should not be larger than 100

clusterName.description:
clusterName is the name of the ManagedCluster. If it is not empty, its value should be unique across all
placement decisions for the Placement.

reason.description: reason represents the reason why the ManagedCluster is selected.

exampleYAML:
apiVersion: cluster.open-cluster-management.io/v1beta1
kind: PlacementDecision
metadata:
  name: example-placementdecision
  namespace: default
